job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: Hello,I am looking for the candidates regarding the following position POSITIONSQL DeveloperLOCATIONOnsite - Weston, FL (Locals Only) - ONLY LOCALS WITH DL AND USC,H4 VISAREQUIRED SKILLSSTRONG SQL experience STRONG SSIS experience MySQL Server experience NO software development Required Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Proven experience in managing offshore resources and deliverables.Strong knowledge and experience with MS SQL Server.Experience in KYC database management and alignment with policy and business requirements. – NICE TO HAVEExcellent project management and organizational skills.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Extensive training opportunities, focused on skills, substantive knowledge, and personal development
